Spaceweather reported that a coronal mass ejection (CME) was observed after an eruption of a magnetic filament.
According to the report, the CME departed the Sun on March 7, 2022 and is expected to … [+668 chars]

articles.title: Chandrayaan-2 makes exciting new discovery below Moon's surface - India Today
articles.description: The new observations provide insight into the dynamics of the lunar exosphere and activities in the first few tens of meters below the lunar surface.
